title: The Journey: GORK THE DESTROYER
description: The Journey is a battle between the Outer World and the underworld. The ONE and the Dark Lord are in Battle for the Kingdoms.the Fighters on both sides are creatures, beasts and walking dead, One normal boy, found the secret to transversing the dimensions of time to finally wind up in the Outer world in the midst of a battle between brothers, The dark lord and the ONE.
author: William Kern
